duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage production and provide leadership to the manufacturing or distribution team.
Facilitate the production process to ensure the achievement of all manufacturing or distribution objectives.
Oversee the production floor, manage the human capital plan, drive operational excellence, and direct capacity management.
Promote a Culture of Zero by continuously monitoring safety rules and requirements.
Lead the completion of Incident Investigations at the time of the event, including root cause and corrective action.
Provide coaching and feedback, establish goals and objectives, and engage in career development planning.
Ensure the right resources are in the right place to run the operation and manage turnover analysis.
Leads Tier 1 Daily Accountability process with Team Leaders and facilitate the Daily Huddle Process.
Problem solving/analyzing, managing incomes/outcomes, driving results vs plan, and promoting continuous improvement.

skills.skill: Excel Data Manipulation and Formula Creation
